purpose: Facilitate the development and integration of autonomous AI agents capable of performing a wide range of tasks
principle: Builds on large language models and integrates with OpenAI's GPT-4 for action execution and decision-making
reusability: Offers a modular library with extensible actions that can be integrated into various AI agent workflows
limitations: Primarily reliant on OpenAI's GPT-4, which may incur usage costs; requires significant setup for custom task definitions
name: npi
highlight: Comprehensive action library enabling AI agents to perform complex tasks autonomously
